entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
